Headline: Kimball-bound Brown Line Service Delayed at Southport
ShortDescription: Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Southport due to Signal problems. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Kimball-bound Brown Line trains are standing near Southport  due to a Signal problems.

Shuttle busses have been requested from Kimball to Belmont to provide connecting service

At this time, also consider other alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. 

This may include

  • #77 Belmont
  • #22 Clark
  • #8 Halsted
  • #81 Lawrence
  • #80 Irving Park
  • #78 Montrose
  • #152 Addison

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Brown Line Service Delayed near Belmont
ShortDescription: Brown Line are standing with major delays due to a stalled train at Belmont. Some Line trains may be affected.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line are standing with major delays due to a stalled train at Belmont. Some Line trains may be affected.

As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between Belmont and Kimball, in both directions.

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include these bus routes:

  • #77 Belmont
  • #22 Clark
  • #8 Halsted
  • #81 Lawrence
  • #80 Irving Park
  • #78 Montrose
  • #152 Addison

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
